name.title: The name Schema
examples: Marbles - Radisson Blu Hotel Dubai Deira Creek

description.title: The description Schema
examples:
Get 25% off at Marbles
1.The offer is valid till 31-10-2022
2.Offer is not valid in conjuction with any offer, discount and special promotion. Offer is valid for dine-in only, not take-away. Offer is not valid on retail.
3.Offer is applicable for ADIB card users only
4.Offer is subject to merchant approval
5.Cardholder must mention the offer before making the payment to redeem the offer.
6.Offer cannot be exchanged for cash or any other merchandise.

howToRedeem.title: The howToRedeem Schema
examples:
1. Visit the restaurant
2. Show the offer details to the management
3. Make sure the offer is applied on your bill
4. Make payment using bank card

termsAndConditions.title: The termsAndConditions Schema
